meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tracy Carlson Bryce Johnson Steven Durham Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6720.

td.p: Tracy Carlson, a marketing consultant and author from Newton, Massachusetts
Bryce Johnson, a wine cellar rat from Corvallis, Oregon
Steven Durham, a writer and stay-at-home dad from Asheville, North Carolina (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,800)

tr.td: ON THE MAP
CELEBRITY INSURANCE POLICIES
SLOGANEERING
GET "DOWN"!
THE NIXON YEARS
THE LEAST INTERESTING MAN IN THE WORLD

tr.td: Steven
Bryce
Tracy
AMERICAN LITERATURE
COATS & JACKETS

WORDS WITHIN WORDS
(Alex: Each correct response will be a word that is contained in its entirety within a word of the clue.)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Steven
Bryce
Tracy

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Oh, Tracy, you can\'t write any more. We come to you first. Let\'s take a look and see if you managed to get something down. ... What were you thinking of?)
(Tracy: Oregon.)
...
(Alex: ...Ducks. Donald Duck.)
TracyWhat is O
$3,001
BryceWhat is the Univ. of Oregon
$5,301
StevenWhat is Oregon
$11,100
the University of Oregon')

Bryce
